Key Match Events: Justyn-Henry Malloy's eighth-inning sacrifice fly helped the Detroit Tigers rally from a 3-0 deficit to move closer to the postseason with a 4-3 win over the Rays
Post-Match Reflections: Rays manager Kevin Cash said 'That's the last team in baseball that you want to give any momentum'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rays' record of consecutive winning records ended after six seasons
Others: The Tigers are tied with Kansas City for the second and third American League wildcard spots, 2Â½ games ahead of Minnesota
